lead_paragraph: A bankruptcy court judge on Monday approved a Sept. 24 auction for the failed $2.4 billion Revel Casino Hotel in Atlantic City after a Florida developer offered $90 million cash for the closed building.

headline.main: Judge OKs Auction for Closed $2.4B Revel Casino
headline.print_headline: Judge OKs Auction for Closed $2.4B Revel Casino
